title: @Riot One more time, read this and share your opinion about Cassiopeia please?
body:
> [{quoted}](name=Nublu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wxOJOf8l,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2015-12-14T00:20:00.270+0000)
>
> So what would you suggest as a fix? and I can agree that she shouldn't really on spamming and excessive clicking but positioning is what all immobile mages deal with, you want her to have a dash? lol

I was asked this question and wanted to make another thread about Cass upon her Kit not by experience. First off I want to let everyone know before you judge about my opinion please look at this thread: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/wxOJOf8l-riot-read-my-first-time-experience-of-cassiopeia-as-of-today

This is just my opinion so don’t bash on me :(

It would be nice if they made her similar to Syndra where her Q and E can inflict damage while the W remains to be the utility except it would be better if her W will expand faster and little more bigger. Her ult bothers me a lot because her slow should scale up to 90% if the enemy have their backs turned, I just don’t get why Kass’s E can scale up to 90% but not her ult.

Her Mana is very bad, all her skills scale up so much mana cost and it just forces Cassiopeia to mandatory get Tear and not RoA or Athenes. Like if I want to get magic resist or be tanky I can’t because Cassiopeia’s mana cost won’t let me.

Her Passive is not really unique in my opinion because I feel like you want her to be the type of champion to spam her abilities as much as possible, if anything she needs a new passive where her poison becomes even more deadly? Idk lol

Oh! and her AA to be improved because I feel like she's throwing green strips of bacon lol

That is my answer to your question. 

https://40.media.tumblr.com/7d6566f481c563987375b4652f2ecc1d/tumblr_msnt0nWZeU1sar26wo1_500.png

**But personally I would just want Cassiopeia to get a Fiora rework, where her kit is entirely changed and her Visuals to be improved because her current classic model doesn’t fully justify as her splash art. If they were to rework Cassiopeia I would want the theme to be Deadly, Poisonous, and Frightful. **

**A utility that brings, an AoE Fear, Slow, and bonus movement speed. Snakes are fast, aggressive and fearful.  Along with a skin that is black and red where it would make people cringe because it’s haunting to look at (; I just love snakes to be the kind of frightful, deadly type. But believe it or not, snakes do indeed dash, they also "fling" where they launch themselves to you and then go back to their original place. Maybe something like that can be brought to her new kit ? idk.**

Her farming passive also... silly. 

=/ Cass's theme is, and always has been "Poison DoT mage". Her rework took the thing most people liked least and put all of her power into it; Im pretty sure Stashu only liked shooting fangs and re-made cass how HE wanted her and not with her playerbase in mind.
One thing i wish from a cass rework at this point is reversion of the purple cloud nerfs and making her fang thingy a toggle that costs mana per attack that gives flat MS. i think it would be fun and give rise to ASP cass builds that focus on ludin/firecannon procs while chasing. As a herpetology geek, the current reptile champs are pretty disappointing . Class needs to FEEL like a snake when playing her.

If that's their way of setting priorities, I don't want to know what else they have in store for us. It's downright screwed up, period.

She also hasn't seen a new skin in three years so far. Just another instance of Riot's ongoing negligence when it comes to this pitiful champion. She's literally the Urgot of midlane, just compare them - they have so much in common in terms of visuals, popularity and gameplay.
